程序包 main

类 RunningBackground

java.lang.Object
main.RunningBackground
public class RunningBackground extends Object
The underlying layer is a BigDecimal class. It has more ways to manipulate.
另请参阅:
Calculation

  • 方法详细资料

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Initialize its value to 0.

    • manipulation

      public boolean manipulation​(String arg, BigDecimal m)
      Safe digital manipulation. Processed at runtime. If the operation symbol does not exist, Skip this time.
      参数:
      arg - The calculation method is defined in the operable class (Calculation).
      m - What manipulation of the original number.
      返回:
      Whether the value was modified successfully.
      另请参阅:
      getCalculation()

    • manipulation

      public boolean manipulation​(String arg, double e)
      Safe digital manipulation.And invokes manipulation(String, BigDecimal) Processed at runtime. If the operation symbol does not exist, Skip this time. In fact, invokes manipulation(String arg, BigDecimal m)
      参数:
      arg - Way of calculation.
      e - What manipulation of the original number. The bottom layer also calls this type of function.
      返回:
      Was it modified successfully.
      另请参阅:
      manipulation(String arg, BigDecimal m)
